definition[0]: one of a pair of long sticks that you put under your arms to help you walk when you have hurt your leg
example[0]: I was on crutches for three months after the operation.
definition[1]: something that gives someone support or help, especially something that is not really good for them
example[1]: As things got worse at work, he began to use alcohol as a crutch.
definition[2]: the part of your body between the tops of your legs
